page.title: 05PROVISIONS FOR INFORMATION.
page.content: In the Square you will find the {Tourist Information Centre}which seeks to advise tourists on local amenities. The staff at the centre answer many questions but the two most popular requests are for a town map and accommodation details. Sites that tourists most wanted to see are the {Tudor buildings,}the{Abbey}and the {Castle.}In Pride Hill there is the {Citizens Advice Bureaux.}It handles 13,000 enquires per year.The most common problem would appear to be those related to the purchasing of goods.{Shrewsbury's Library}stands in Castle Foregate.The library has two sections a lending and a local studies section.The lending section has 60,000 books mainly fiction but a lot are information books.The other section is used by many tourists to trace their family trees.
